summary: update global product attribute (For cross boarder sellers only)
description: update global product attribute (For cross boarder sellers only)

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/product/global/attribute/update')
request.add_api_parameter("payload", "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"?> <Request>   <Product>     <item_id>624525348185548</item_id>     <AssociatedSku>wensong_test_cb_hk</AssociatedSku>     <PrimaryCategory>4339</PrimaryCategory>     <Attributes>       <pants_length>Full Length,Cropped</pants_length>       <fa_pattern>Plaid</fa_pattern>     </Attributes>   </Product> </Request>")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/product/global/attribute/update')
request.add_api_param('payload', '<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"?> <Request>   <Product>     <item_id>624525348185548</item_id>     <AssociatedSku>wensong_test_cb_hk</AssociatedSku>     <PrimaryCategory>4339</PrimaryCategory>     <Attributes>       <pants_length>Full Length,Cropped</pants_length>       <fa_pattern>Plaid</fa_pattern>     </Attributes>   </Product> </Request>')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
